question_text: What is a likely consequence of loading letter-size paper into a tray configured for legal size in the print driver?
answer_options: The printer will automatically resize the output
Pages will be printed in landscape mode by default
A paper size mismatch error will occur
The printer will reboot after each job
correct_answer: A paper size mismatch error will occur
explanation: If the driver expects legal-size paper but detects letter-size in the tray, it will halt printing with a mismatch error until resolved.
